categories.title: Bug Fixes and Improvements in ElizaOS

content.text: Fixed an issue related to participant errors.
Ensured the dimension is set up before starting the client to prevent potential issues.
Fixed an issue in Twitter Spaces where speaker removal was not handled correctly.

Made a small fix related to Twitter functionality, improving error handling and validation. Additionally, Twitter posting now requires explicit activation, and tweet interactions include more context.
Fixed issues related to extensions and migrations.

Founder DAOs have been introduced on Solana as a Kickstarter-style fundraising entity. These DAOs enable projects across art, AI, and finance to raise funds and be governed by a token-based community. Creators and founders can specify their DAO token, provide a description, and set allocation percentages for fundraising and team distribution.

The tokenomics of Founder DAOs involve minting 10 billion tokens, with 4 billion immediately available to the public via a bonding curve. The team allocation is vested until funding is complete, after which it migrates to Raydium, with half allocated to the DAOS pool. The remaining tokens are locked into the DAO as a community pool, governed by voting.
The first official Founder DAO, @Artistdaofun, has been launched on daos.fun.

categories.title: Server Cleanup and Clank Tank Lighting Preview

content.text: A server cleanup is in progress, with plans to add Hyperfy and Whisper services in the future.
A baked lighting version of the Clank Tank set is being previewed and will soon be cross-platform. The update is associated with Hyperfy.

categories.title: Local AI Refactor and Potential Clank Tank Integration

content.text: The Local AI system has been refactored to improve configuration validation, error handling, and logging. New features include a configurable 'Local AI Configuration' section with environment variables, dynamic text generation with multiple model sources, and dedicated management modules for external text and speech generation services. The update also enhances model download and text-to-speech processes for better reliability.
There is interest in exploring a potential integration between Clank Tank and the updated Local AI system.

categories.title: PGlite Migrations Fix and Development Updates

content.text: A recent update focused on fixing PGlite migrations and implementing a code-first approach for SQL management. Key improvements include support for vector and fuzzystrmatch extensions, ensuring proper extension loading before migrations, and refactoring database setup for consistency. The changes are categorized as low-risk bug fixes and improvements.

Development efforts also included package improvements, new feature additions, and five bug fixes. A total of 10 contributors merged 10 pull requests, with major work focused on various enhancements such as setting up dimensions before starting the client and checking plugin installation status.

A pull request titled 'Stable' has been created, outlining potential risks, background information, and testing steps. The PR template includes sections for issue tracking, risk assessment, documentation updates, and deployment instructions.
Another pull request titled 'building' has been initiated, marking the beginning of tracing into the documentation. The work is still in progress.
Maksim Yurchanka is the first founder to complete project details, as noted by @baoskee.
@alecvxyz comments on a meme that could have sparked intense debates in old IRC chats.
ElizaOS has announced a partnership with NEAR Protocol, emphasizing that their partners and community remain the backbone of their ecosystem.
